Sadio Mané is set to resume full training when Liverpool return to Melwood next week. (@LFC)

Klopp has confirmed Mané will return and will be a part of the group of players who head out to Germany for the pre-season fixtures. (@LFC)

Klopp: “Sadio's on the way back. The plan is he will come with us to Germany. The plan is he trains completely normally with us in England."

Klopp: "We have been waiting long enough for him now! He is around Melwood all of the time and is in pretty good shape."

Klopp: "Unfortunately he was not ready to train, but he looked good, it looks good and so now he should be fine when we get back."

No such conversations have taken place and Van Dijk has not tried to force through a move behind the scenes. (@adamleitchsport)

A transfer request would be out of character for Van Dijk with the laid back defender a solid member of the Saints squad. (@adamleitchsport)

Southampton believe they are entitled to loyalty from Van Dijk in return for their investment of a five-year deal. (@adamleitchsport)
